function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of economic interventions for impoverished households","Impact":"Increased financial strain on low-income households, leading to further economic hardships","Mitigation":"Expansion of cash payments, loan guarantees, and tax deferrals to support low-income households","Technologies":"Financial tracking and risk assessment tools for identifying vulnerable households","People":"Impoverished households","Owner":"Government and financial institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate social support for vulnerable and at-risk groups","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to infection and negative consequences of the pandemic among vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Providing shelters, personal protective equipment, and hygiene supplies for vulnerable groups, as well as support for victims of domestic violence and other at-risk populations","Technologies":"Tracking and monitoring systems to identify and support vulnerable populations","People":"Vulnerable and at-risk groups (e.g., victims of domestic violence, elderly, refugees, prisoners, migrants)","Owner":"Government and social service organizations"},{"Description":"Higher COVID-19 cases and mortality rates in socially vulnerable groups","Impact":"Disproportionate impact of the pandemic on socially vulnerable groups, leading to increased illness and mortality","Mitigation":"Targeted outreach and education, improved access to healthcare, and specific support for socially vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Data analytics to identify areas with high vulnerability and targeted healthcare resources","People":"Low socioeconomic groups, workers, refugees, migrants, homeless, minorities","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government, and community organizations"}]}
